snippet.title: Akuji the Heartless [trailer]
snippet.description:
Akuji the Heartless is an action-adventure video game, released in December, 1998 on the PlayStation. It uses a modified Gex: Enter the Gecko engine, and both games were developed by Crystal Dynamics. The gameplay involves hack and slash combat combined with platform elements.

More @ Wikipedia:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Akuji_the_Heartless
